author: wsjcom
title: Jack Nicklaus on the Ohio Neighborhood Where He Fell in Love With Golf
text:
Jack Nicklaus, 78, won a record 18 major professional golf championships, including six Masters. He is the founder of the Nicklaus Cos. and the author of multiple books on golf. He spoke with Marc Myers.
When I was almost 6, my dadâ€™s friends carried him home. My father was a superb athlete and had been an 11-time letterman in high school. While playing volleyball that night, he broke his ankle. It was an injury that would change my life.
